description: I have an environment,the value of disk_available_least is 34G,the value of free_disk_gb is 49G.I parallel boot(execute nova boot twice,and the interval of two operation is very short)two instances with flavor，which the value of disk is 20G.Becuase the total disk value of two instances is greater than the value of disk_available_least,so the expected result is that one spawn succeed and one spawn failed, but actual result is all of two instances spawned succeed.
title: arallel deployment instances

comments.content: I have an environment,the value of disk_available_least is 34G,the value of free_disk_gb is 49G.I parallel boot(execute nova boot twice,and the interval of two operation is very short)two instances with flavor，which the value of disk is 20G.Becuase the total disk value of two instances is greater than the value of disk_available_least,so the expected result is that one spawn succeed and one spawn failed, but actual result is all of two instances spawned succeed.

comments.content: Hi tangxing, I noticed you've both reported and assigned this bug to yourself. If you are working on a fix for this issue, please change the status to "In Progress" and submit a patch within 2 weeks with the "closes-bug" tag in the commit message. If you are not working on a fix, please remove yourself as the assignee.
